Tucson points to his sword, the katana with the dragon hilt, and a cross bo=
w with a quiver of plasma tipped arrows.

" Over there, those are the weapo=
ns I came in with.  I'll need those.  They are the weapons I was trained wi=
th and they are the only ones I use.  But there's a bow staff there, I know=
 how to use that, and if you come across any ninja stars, daggers or sais, =
I can use those too."

Clearly he was intent on fighting with traditional w=
eaponry.  He knew he excelled in the use of Ninjabot weapons.  And if he ha=
d to, unarmed combat was also a choice for him. 

Perpetually on the move a=
nd constantly busy. 

On Oct 21, 2011, at 2:40 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyc=
lonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson looks to Night Viper with=
 a somewhat commanding stare. Of course it
> > was all in jest but he could=
n't help play the part of a formidable predator.
> >
> > " Excuse me Night =
Viper but, do you always talk to a Prime in that manner?
> > FYI , my full =
name is TUCSON PRIME, not tall and scaly."
> >
> > He gives him the draconi=
c grin .
> >
> > " Just so you know for future reference."
> 
> NIGHT VIPER=
 spins around to face TUSCON, he had not been talking to
> him at the time =
but about him, but the point stood. "Yes sir, your
> Primeship, of course."=
 He saluted him with a smile. "It won't happen
> again suh!" He said.
> 
> =
About that time BIG CONVOY came out of the tunnel that exited high up
> on =
the hallway's wall. He landed on the floor, while not nearly as
> gracefull=
y as that of NIGHT VIPER and perhaps TUSCON, but his bulk
> made little noi=
se as it came down. More of a combat landing, but it
> was solid enough.
> =

> Looking around he glanced at the scene, LONG RACK and the rest loking
> =
at TUSCON PRIME and NIGHT VIPER, the latter standing at attention
> salutin=
g the former. He shook his head, "You got the stash ready?" He
> said looki=
ng over at LONGRACK.
> 
> The tall yet slimly built second officer nodded, =
"Of course, right
> here boss." He said, holding out a rather large case to=
 him. He nodded
> over at TUSCON, "What about the Prime?"
> 
> "I'll handle=
 it." CONVOY said as he turned to look at TUSCON.
> 
> Openeing the case th=
ere were two missile racks which he carefully slid
> on each shoulder, incr=
easing his bulk for a moment before they folded
> into his shoulders, and h=
e picked up a rather large looking cannon and
> hefted it experimantally. H=
e nodded, satisfied.
> 
> "Tuscon Prime." BIG CONVOY said, emphasising the =
'Prime' part of
> TUSCON's name presumably for the benfit of the others, "Y=
ou need any
> sort of weaponry or armaments before we move on?" He glanced =
up at the
> grating they had just come out of, he closed it with the tip of=
 his
> cannon.
> 
> "I would suspect they will soon discover our ruse." He =
looked at
> TUSCON directly, "I need to know if you're ready? This is going=
 to get
> really messy really fast."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson points to his sword, the katana=
 with the dragon hilt, and a cross bow with a quiver of plasma tipped arrow=
s.</div><div><br></div><div>" Over there, those are the weapons I came in w=
ith.  I'll need those.  They are the weapons I was trained with a=
nd they are the only ones I use.  But there's a bow staff there, I kno=
w how to use that, and if you come across any ninja stars, daggers or sais,=
 I can use those too."</div><div><br></div><div>Clearly he was intent on fi=
ghting with traditional weaponry.  He knew he excelled in the use of N=
injabot weapons.  And if he had to, unarmed combat was also a choice f=
or him. <br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </di=
v><div><br>On Oct 21, 2011, at 2:40 PM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailt=
o:supercyclonus@...">supercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></=
div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><div>




<span style=3D"display:n=
one"> </span>



    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>&gt=
; <OLD><br>
><br>
> Tucson looks to Night Viper with a somewhat=
 commanding stare.  Of course it<br>
> was all in jest but he couldn't h=
elp play the part of a formidable predator.<br>
><br>
> " Excuse me N=
ight Viper but, do you always talk to a Prime in that manner?<br>
> FYI =
, my full name is TUCSON PRIME, not tall and scaly."<br>
><br>
> He g=
ives him the draconic grin .<br>
><br>
> " Just so you know for futur=
e reference."<br>
<br>
NIGHT VIPER spins around to face TUSCON, he had not =
been talking to<br>
him at the time but about him, but the point stood. "Ye=
s sir, your<br>
Primeship, of course." He saluted him with a smile. "It won=
't happen<br>
again suh!" He said.<br>
<br>
About that time BIG CONVOY came=
 out of the tunnel that exited high up<br>
on the hallway's wall. He landed=
 on the floor, while not nearly as<br>
gracefully as that of NIGHT VIPER an=
d perhaps TUSCON, but his bulk<br>
made little noise as it came down. More =
of a combat landing, but it<br>
was solid enough.<br>
<br>
Looking around h=
e glanced at the scene, LONG RACK and the rest loking<br>
at TUSCON PRIME a=
nd NIGHT VIPER, the latter standing at attention<br>
saluting the former. H=
e shook his head, "You got the stash ready?" He<br>
said looking over at LO=
NGRACK.<br>
<br>
The tall yet slimly built second officer nodded, "Of cours=
e, right<br>
here boss." He said, holding out a rather large case to him. H=
e nodded<br>
over at TUSCON, "What about the Prime?"<br>
<br>
"I'll handle =
it." CONVOY said as he turned to look at TUSCON.<br>
<br>
Openeing the case=
 there were two missile racks which he carefully slid<br>
on each shoulder,=
 increasing his bulk for a moment before they folded<br>
into his shoulders=
, and he picked up a rather large looking cannon and<br>
hefted it experima=
ntally. He nodded, satisfied.<br>
<br>
"Tuscon Prime." BIG CONVOY said, emp=
hasising the 'Prime' part of<br>
TUSCON's name presumably for the benfit of=
 the others, "You need any<br>
sort of weaponry or armaments before we move=
 on?" He glanced up at the<br>
grating they had just come out of, he closed=
 it with the tip of his<br>
cannon.<br>
<br>
"I would suspect they will soo=
n discover our ruse." He looked at<br>
TUSCON directly, "I need to know if =
you're ready? This is going to get<br>
really messy really fast."<br>
<br>
=
(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
</p>
